abstracts.cdata!:
The Tenth Industrial Imports Program
            Wealth Project will enable selected priority industries to
            maintain and expand their production by supplying part of
            their requirements of foreign exchange for imports of raw
            materials, components, and spares. The products of the
            eligible industries fall into four categories: (i) items for
            agricultural development; (ii) commercial vehicles including
            automotive ancillaries; (iii) electrical goods; and (iv)
            capital equipment, including general industrial items.
